data.title: Charity Auction in aid of the Adam Stansfield Foundation
data.meta_description: Great work guys in getting this together. Well earned pat on back.
data.text:
Many thanks Brian. Nice to know that our hard efforts have been appreciated.

We can now confirm the final line up of special guests - Comedians Chris Turner and Luke Honnoraty will be performing on the night, as will magician Chris Tennant and Exmouth-based band e.m.p will be rounding off the evening belting out some classic rock tunes as well as some original stuff.

The OS has an article HERE about the event and the items up for grabs. The auction catalogue can be accessed HERE and from the article on the OS. The article also lists the details on how to bid on the various items.

We've had a fair few bids in already, so to make sure that you don't miss out on any items that take your fancy, please get your bids in NOW!

Also, if you're at a loose end on Saturday, please come along - tickets are only £5 and include a free drink on arrival. Tickets should be available on the door on the night as well as from club reception this week so please spread the word and come along if you can!

Thought you might....

We've had lots of well-wishes and bids from clubs on other forums which is nice to see. It's just a little disappointing that there hasn't been much of a response on here really .

It's all for a good cause - tickets will be on sale on the door on the night should you make a last-minute decision to come along. If you can - please do!

Of course. Here are the items up for grabs along with the reserve prices (current highest bids are in BOLD - items with no bold price have yet to be bidded on!):

AFC Bournemouth - Signed 11/12 Home Shirt - £30 - £60

Brighton and Hove Albion - Signed Promotion 2010/11 T-Shirt - £20 - £30

Bristol Rovers – Signed Shirt - £30

Burnley - Signed Shirt - £30

Burton Albion - Signed Pennant - £20 - £22

Charlton Athletic - Signature Sheet - £5

Cheltenham Town - Ticket voucher for 2 people to any home game - £10

Colchester United – Signed Shirt - £30

Crystal Palace - Match worn shirt signed by Dean Moxey - £30

Dagenham and Redbridge - Signed Ball - £20

Derby County - Scarf/Programmes/Pen - £5

Derby County - Moxey 21 Home Shirt signed by last season’s squad - £30 - £30

Everton - Signed Marouane Fellaini Photo - £25

Exeter City - Signed Shirt - £30 - £150

Exeter City - Signed Ball - £20

Exeter City Youth - Signed Ball - £15

Hartlepool United - Signed Ball - £20

Hereford United - Signed Shirt - £30 - £50

Hereford United - Signed Ball - £20 - £50

Ipswich Town - Signed Pennant - £20

Leyton Orient - Ticket voucher for 4 people to any home game - £15

Liverpool - Signed Pepe Reina Photo - £25

Manchester City - Stadium Tour for family of 4 – to be used by September 2011 - £20

Middlesbrough - Away Shirt match-worn and signed by Andrew Halliday - £30

Milton Keynes Dons - Signed Ball - £20

Morecambe – Home Shirt - match worn by Craig Stanley - £25

Northampton Town - Signed Shirt match-worn by Steve Guinan in the Carling Cup win over Liverpool - £30 - £40

Norwich City – Signed Pennant/Scarf/Photo - £20

Notts County - Signed Ball - £20

Oldham Athletic - Match worn shirt (Nardiello) - £25 - £40

Peterborough United - Signed Shirt - £30

Scunthorpe United - Signed Team Photo - £15

Southampton - Signed Pennant - £20 - £40

Stevenage - Signed Ball - £20 - £101

Stockport County - Programme from last Football League game - £3

Torquay United - Signed Shirt - £30

Walsall - Signed Ball - £20 - £25

Wigan Athletic - Signed Shirt - £30

Wolverhampton Wanderers - Signed Shirt - £30

Wycombe Wanderers - Signed Pennant - £20

Yeovil Town - Voucher for 2 tickets in the home end for 11/12 season – not valid for all-ticket games - £15

Around the Grounds - Banner signed by Exeter City, Yeovil Town and Hereford United squads - £25

As you can see, we've had a fair few bids in already!

If you can't make it on the night, you can either send in an e-mail bid to [email protected] or phone/text in a bid on 07747 465936. Bids close at 7pm on Saturday evening, so any bids made after this time will not be counted! To bid after this time, you will have to be at the auction itself!

Tickets can be purchased either from ECFC reception or on the door on the night.
